QuestData.Title: Of Love and Family
QuestData.Description: Inside the Scarlet Bastion is a painting of great personal value to Highlord Tirion Fordring. Search for a painting of our twin moons. Chip away at the paint until you uncover the master work, 'Of Love and Family.'$B$BMay the Light guide your actions, and please handle the painting with the utmost care.
QuestData.CompletionText: The painting, $N. Do you have the painting?
QuestData.RewardText: Master Fordring will be glad beyond measure to see this painting again.
